state.py

Contains the class State.

State
State

Represents a snapshot of all transient data of a Model.  In particular, holds Objs and Grippers, allows to access directly change their data.

Functions
Constructor
Variables
objs
self.objs

dictionary mapping ids to Objs

grippers
self.grippers

dictionary mapping ids to Grippers

Functions
get_obj_dict
Returns

dictionary mapping Obj ids to Obj dictionaries

get_obj_ids
Returns

iterable of the Objs' ids

get_obj_by_id
Params
id

registered identifier of the Obj to retrieve

Returns

Obj instance, if existing, else None

get_gripper_dict

In contrast to get_obj_dict, each gripper dict has the entry "gripped", which itself is None or a dictionary mapping the gripped object to an object dictionary.

Returns

dictionary mapping Gripper ids to Gripper dictionaries

get_gripper_ids
Returns

iterable of the Grippers' ids

get_gripper_by_id
Params
id

registered identifier of the Gripper to retrieve

Returns

Gripper instance, if existing, else None

get_gripper_coords
Params
id

registered identifier of the Gripper in question

Returns

list: [x, y] or empty list if id does not exist

get_gripped_obj
Params
id

registered identifier of the Gripper in question

Returns

None or the id of the gripped Obj

move_gr

Change a Gripper position by moving in direction (dx, dy).

Params
id

id of the Gripper to move, has to be registered

dx

x direction

dy

y direction

move_gr

Change an Obj position by moving in direction (dx, dy).

Params
id

id of the Obj to move, has to be registered

dx

x direction

dy

y direction

rotate_obj

Change an Obj's goal_rotation by d_angle.

Params
id

id of the Obj to rotate, has to be registered

d_angle

current angle is changed by d_angle

rotated_matrix

optional: pre-rotated block matrix, otherwise the current matrix is rotated

flip_obj

Mirror an Obj.

Params
id

id of the Obj to flip, has to be registered

flipped_matrix

optional: pre-flipped block matrix, otherwise the current matrix is flipped

grip

Attach a given Obj to the Gripper.

Params
gr_id

id of the Gripper that grips obj_id

obj_id

id of the Obj to grip, has to be registered

ungrip

Detach the currently gripped Obj from the Gripper.

Params
id

id of the Gripper that ungrips

rotate_block_matrix

Rearrange blocks of a 0/1 block matrix to apply some rotation.

Params
old_matrix

block matrix describing the current block positions

d_angle

float or int, angle to apply.  Can be negative for leftwards rotation.

Returns

the new block matrix with changed block positions

flip_block_matrix

Flips blocks using a horizontal axis of reflection.

Params
old_matrix

block matrix describing the current block positions

Returns

a new block matrix with 1s in horizontally mirrored positions

to_dict

Constructs a JSON-friendly dictionary representation of this instance.

Returns

Dictionary representation of this State instance.
